sn31.23-112:1.2: Ekamantam nisinno kho so bhikkhu bhagavantam etadavoca:
sn31.23-112:1.3: “ko nu kho, bhante, hetu, ko paccayo, yena midhekacco kayassa bheda param marana saragandhe adhivatthanam devanam …pe…
sn31.23-112:1.12: “Idha, bhikkhu, ekacco kayena sucaritam carati, vacaya sucaritam carati, manasa sucaritam carati.
sn31.23-112:1.16: ‘aho vataham kayassa bheda param marana gandhagandhe adhivatthanam devanam sahabyatam upapajjeyyan’ti.
sn31.23-112:1.27: So kayassa bheda param marana gandhagandhe adhivatthanam devanam sahabyatam upapajjati.
sn31.23-112:1.28: Ayam kho, bhikkhu, hetu, ayam paccayo, yena midhekacco kayassa bheda param marana gandhagandhe adhivatthanam devanam sahabyatam upapajjati”ti.
sn31.23-112:2.1: (Evam pindakena ekasatanca dvadasa ca suttanta honti.)
